original_text: So you have done what you promised to do to us and to our rulers. You have caused us to have terrible trouble. You have punished Jerusalem with more trouble than has ever happened to any other city.
korean_text: 주께서 큰 재앙을 우리에게 내리사 우리와 및 우리를 재판하던 재판관을 쳐서 하신 말씀을 이루셨사오니 온 천하에 예루살렘에서 일어난 일 같은 것이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: what you promised to do to us
You have caused us to have terrible trouble
with more trouble than has ever happened
sentences.korean_translation: 지금까지 일어난 적 없는 더 큰 재앙으로
